fix_td112_legacy.instruction: Implement Integer-based Inheritance logic to prevent asset leaks.
fix_td112_legacy.title: Fix_TD112_Inheritance_Rounding

spec_td109_sequence.instruction:
PROJECT: TD-109 Sacred Sequence Fix Spec.

OBJECTIVE: Design the architecture to ensure Government, Bank, and InheritanceManager emit Transactions instead of calling direct transfers.

REQUIREMENTS:
1. Update TickScheduler to collect transactions from agents/managers.
2. Refactor Government.invest_infrastructure to return Transaction.
3. Refactor Bank.check_solvency to return Transaction (Lender of Last Resort).
4. Refactor InheritanceManager to return Transaction list.

OUTPUT: 'design/specs/TD109_SEQUENCE_FIX_SPEC.md'
